grow_event_type_ghost/3901_1301_0100_10:
Hey, hey! Why don’t we have a Pokémon battle?
I want to see how strong your bond with your
partner is!
grow_event_type_ghost/3902_1031_0100_10:
Ahahaha!
I can’t wait to battle!
grow_event_type_ghost/3902_1301_0100_10:
Let’s test whose bond with their Pokémon is
stronger—yours or mine!
grow_event_type_ghost/3903_1031_0100_10:
I’ll show you how a real
Trainer battles!
grow_event_type_ghost/3903_1301_0100_10:
Pokémon are for battling! Come, child!
I’ll show you how to command them on the
battlefield properly!
